name: v1_thesaurus
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool thesaurus_by_api_ninjas.
Tool description: Get synonym and antonyms for any word. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/thesaurus.
API description: API Ninjas Thesaurus API endpoint. Returns a list of synonyms and a list of antonyms for a given word.

word.description: The word for which to find synonyms and antonyms.
